Text:
Perfect coordination and supple movements...
Your efforts up to this point are plain to see.

That's right! We put in a lot of work for today!
That's why we can't let you interfere any longer!

Indeed, and I won't. Put the crystallization of your
accomplishment on display for all to see.

But never forget! Should you do anything untoward
again, I am always watching you! Farewell!
W-Wait! What's that supposed to mean?!
Alexia. Leave her to the guards.

More importantly...look. Look at everyone out there
cheering for us.
Huh...?

The student council president and Princess Alexia are
amazing! Who wouldn't fall for girls who can fight
like that!

They're so cute, but also so strong...! I love you
both!!!

These cheers, this sea of light... It's all directed
at us... Don't you feel proud?

I suppose I do. The real show is yet to come,
so let's keep the momentum going!

(Excellent, excellent. The fight dragged on a bit,
but the excitement has reached a fever pitch, just
as I'd hoped!)

(All that's left now is the big show! C'mon, ladies,
knock it out of the park!)

Sorry to keep you waiting, everyone! We will now
resume our performance!
Now, let's try this again... Start the music!

(Alexia seems like she's having so much fun... I need
to make sure I enjoy myself just as much as her!)

(Rose looks so pretty... But I won't let myself be
outshone!)

(They're both performing as practiced...no, even
better than that!)

(It's like they're in tune with the students' energy.
Gotta remember to say thanks to Beta, and Eta for
making the glow sticks.)
Po! Did ya see that?!
No, I didn't, Skel!

Dumbass! Ya gotta look from a lower angle! Moments
like this're all about puttin' your body on the line!
But I can't go any...agh! S-Someone's stepping on me!
...You're in the way.
(Those idiots...)

—That concludes our performance! Thank you so much,
everyone!
There was a little disturbance, but did you have fun?
...This could make serious bank.

(It'd be a huge waste to let all this crazy energy
fizzle out with today's one-off. I should totally
market them to the world as academy idols.)

(But in that case, I don't really like my chances
with just two people. Maybe I'll get Sherry to join
so we can reach a broader fanbase...)

I owe you my thanks, Alexia. It was because of your
aid that the performance went so superbly.

Not at all. I simply didn't want to be outdone by
you. Looking at it from another viewpoint, it's all
because of you that I'm standing here now...

So, I owe you my gratitude as well. Thank you very
much.

...Welp, guess that's that. Seems like they both got
what they wanted out of it anyway.

Why, Cid, your cheeks are about to burst... Is your
first lunch with me in so long really that delicious?
(No, it's because you forced all this in my mouth...)

Do you have any idea how much trouble I went through
to catch you? There was one point when I thought I
had you, but it turned out to be a case of mistaken
identity...
Wow...
(But yeah, I actually do know, though.)

By the way, did you see the anniversary ceremony the
other day?

I've been hearing talk of the princesses' performance
everywhere lately. People are saying it was the
stuff of legends.

But here's the thing—they apparently had a mysterious
producer working behind the scenes.
Huh, really. I had no idea.

(This is it! This is what I want to be!
Hell yeah, I really nailed it!)
...Why the grin?
Huh? I-I'm not grinning.

Heehee. Could it be you're imagining me wearing one
of those outfits?

I swear, you are the most incorrigible brother ever!
Normally I'm not one to care about dressing up, but
fine! I'll show you if the opportunity arises!
Y-Yay...

(Despite all the trouble, I'm still glad I did it.
I even created a performance that'll go down in
academy history in the process!)
(Yep, doesn't get much better than that!)

And so Cid finished his work as the producer in
shadow. He heard talk of himself for some time after,
and could not help but grin when he did...
